item.title: How to get a getch( )
item.description: Bummer, your small c apps compiler doesn’t have a getch(). We can overcome this by installing ncurses or create our own getch() function. ncurses If you’re using cygwin, we should install ncurses first (it’s not included in cygwin’s default setup).
